post.body: Absolutely! Sounds like fun! I'm looking forward to The Party... I had a blast at the '07 event in Denver...
I spent the countdown in my car a couple of years ago. My date was not happy with her outfit so we drove to get a new one....
O & I just noticed U're w/ the M$ partner team. I'll be at the Worldwide Partner Conference in New Orleans in July
Hi, thank U!!! I'm from the midwest US & I work in the software business I have a myspace page for BIO... http://twitpic.com/yaz0
Well, it's the last day of the world, how are you going to spend it?
I'm attempting 2 figure out twttr.... & now using TweetDeck....
I'm getting ready to travel shortly...
I'm tired, actually I think just lazy
